Frequently asked questions

Why do you sell? Why don’t you cash these products yourselves?

Oh, but we do. Big time. This shop is automated for a reason. Our main problem is we cannot cashout hundreds, sometimes thousands of accounts. So you’re asking a silly question. We sell because we still make profit despite the small prices.

Do you offer any guarantees?

Of course. All our products are verified on a daily basis. However it can happen that you receive a faulty product, in that case you will get a total refund or another product. On top of that, all our products have a 30 day warranty. This means that you have 30 days to cash out. Example: you buy a PayPal account, but you begin cashing it out 10 days after purchase and realize that it has been frozen for some reason. Contact us, and we’ll replace it or refund.

Do you ship to any country?

Yes. However, the express and overnight shipping methods are not available for some countries. Also Cash products are shippend only through regular mail. 

What do you accept for payment?

Right now we accept payments in various cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Monero, Litecoin, Ripple, Stellar, Dogecoin, Cardano, Bitcoin Cash, zCash, Ethereum Classic and Tron). More will follow in the near future.

Will I be safe using your products?

If you ask us, yes. But we are veterans and have certain safety routines. It is not 100% safe. You cannot be careless about any of these things, even visiting our website is quite unsafe if you don’t use tor. We would say it’s 95% safe. The missing 5% depends on you to take some measures of privacy.
